messages.content: Vote Labour to ensure we have strong Labour MPs in Parliament standing up to the Tories.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Prevent the loss of Winter fuel allowance for pensioners.
Ensure continuation of free school meals for children.
Increase funding to prevent the NHS from being brought to its knees.

issues.education: Many families are dependent on the free school meal which the Tories plan to axe. It is simply wrong that under the Tories more children are living in poverty.
issues.health: The Tories have brought the NHS to its knees. When a loved one is sick, families shouldn’t be worried about the future of their home.
issues.socialWelfare: Under the Tories I stand to lose my Winter fuel allowance; many pensioners will once again be facing a cold bleak future.

community.content: They are threatening to take money from pensioners, force people to use their homes to pay for care, take school lunches from children.

quotes.text: Under the Tories I stand to lose my Winter fuel allowance; many pensioners will once again be facing a cold bleak future.
Many families are dependent on the free school meal which the Tories plan to axe. It is simply wrong that under the Tories more children are living in poverty.
The Tories have brought the NHS to its knees. When a loved one is sick, families shouldn’t be worried about the future of their home.

examples: Under the Tories I stand to lose my Winter fuel allowance; many pensioners will once again be facing a cold bleak future.
Many families are dependent on the free school meal which the Tories plan to axe. It is simply wrong that under the Tories more children are living in poverty.
The Tories have brought the NHS to its knees. When a loved one is sick, families shouldn’t be worried about the future of their home.
They are threatening to take money from pensioners, force people to use their homes to pay for care, take school lunches from children.
Vote Labour to ensure we have strong Labour MPs in Parliament standing up to the Tories.
